# Crete

𓐍 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓌙 was once an ethnonym or broad loconym rather than a specific name for an island

𒄩𒋾 Ḫatti = 𓐍𓏏𓍔𓄿𓌙 Goth Cretes

Kition was the city(state) of Cyprus

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne | quaryt court

Cretian syllabary and hieroglyphs

𐀛 ni 𐘝 NI νικύλεον "fig"
νικύλεον· τὸ σῦκον ἐν ταῖς Κρητικαῖς γλώσσαις (attributed to Hermonax in Athenaeus Deipnosophistae 76e).

𐁅 NWA never ¬ NO 𓂜 𐁅 nix 𐀛 FIGS

See Linear A / Linear-B / Minoan / Lycian / Luwian / Anatolian / Cypriotic syllabaries !
